Interesting.  The one level I have designed is beyond difficult or 
hard.  I challenge anybody to beat my one level with a *legitimate* 
team right now because it can not be done.  Every new level I will 
create has one purpose:  to prepare a team for my Extreme Level.

I am telling you upfront that I will be testing my new levels with
two 
 different teams:  one slightly illegit team composed of 1 archmage,
1 
 mage, and 2 clerics.

That 100% legitimate team will be composed of the following 
characters: 1 elf, 2 mages (one will be converted into an archmage 
when it has enough experience), and 2 clerics.  I have not started my 
legitimate team through any levels YET.
